page.title: 03WALKING DAY
page.content:
The Walking Day is an annual event of St. Mathew's Church in Highfield.It is held on the first Sunday in June.All the parish organisations take part.
Among the paraders are the Boys Brigade,the Smuffs(St. Mathew's Under 15 Fellowship),the Brownies and the Pram Club. The procession moves down Billinge Road,up Tunstall Lane,up Pemberton Road,down Enfield Street and back to church.
If the weather stays fine,a service is held on the cricket field.If the weather is inclement,then it is held in the church.
The event attracts a large crowd of onlookers along the route.
